participant_1.background:
I am a recent college grad who donates blood in honor of my late sister.
I try to go for a walk every day, but it can be difficult because I can't see well.
i fly airplanes.
I have a secret diary that I keep hidden in my room.
i post on reddit often.

participant_2.background:
I'm nervous about my first day of safety patrol.
My biggest challenge was when I was in the military and had to be away from my family for long periods of time.
I went to Thailand once and it was an amazing experience.
my major is in business administration.
i think i m fabulous.

content.text: Hey, how are you doing today?
I'm doing pretty good, just nervous about my first day of safety patrol.
Oh, I bet that's exciting! What's safety patrol?
It's a program where students are trained to help keep their school safe.
Oh, that's really cool! I'm sure you'll do great.
Thanks, I hope so!
So, what's your major?
My major is in business administration.
Oh, that's cool! I've always been interested in business.
Yeah, it's a lot of fun! What do you do for fun?
I like to go for walks, I'm a recent college grad who donates blood in honor of my late sister.
Oh, that's really nice of you! I used to donate blood when I was in the military.
Oh, what branch were you in?
I was in the Army.
Oh, cool! I've always wanted to join the military.
It was a great experience, but it was definitely challenging being away from my family for long periods of time.
Yeah, I can imagine. I'm glad you had a good experience though.
Thanks!
So, what's your favorite thing about being a safety patroller?
My favorite thing is being able to help keep my school safe.
That's great! I'm sure you're going to be a great safety patroller.
Thanks! I hope so!
